metadata.description: Username for the Virtual Machine.
Password for the Virtual Machine.
Naming prefix for all deployed resources
Identifies whether to to use PAYG (on demand licensing) or BYOL license model (where license is purchased separately)
FortiGate Version
The ARM template provides a basic configuration. Additional configuration can be added here.
Virtual Machine size selection - must be F4 or other instance that supports 4 NICs

Deploy FortiGate VMs in an Availability Set or Availability Zones. If Availability Zones deployment is selected but the location does not support Availability Zones an Availability Set will be deployed. If Availability Zones deployment is selected and Availability Zones are available in the location, FortiGate A will be placed in Zone 1, FortiGate B will be placed in Zone 2
Accelerated Networking enables direct connection between the VM and network card. Only available on 2 CPU F/Fs and 4 CPU D/Dsv2, D/Dsv3, E/Esv3, Fsv2, Lsv2, Ms/Mms and Ms/Mmsv2
Accelerated connections provides an enhanced bandwidth at an additional cost
Accelerated Connections Auxiliary SKU bandwidth Tiers
Identify if to use a public IP, and if so whether it's new
Whether to use a public IP and if so whether it is new
Whether to use a public IP and if so whether it is new
Name of Public IP address element.
Resource group to which the Public IP belongs.
Type of public IP address
SKU of public IP address
Type of public IP address
Name of Public IP address element.
Resource group to which the Public IP belongs.
SKU of public IP address
Type of public IP address
Name of Public IP address element.
Resource group to which the Public IP belongs.
SKU of public IP address
Identify whether to use a new or existing vnet
Name of the Azure virtual network.
Resource Group containing the virtual network - or new resource group from above (if new vnet)
Virtual Network Address prefix
Subnet 1 Name
Subnet 1 Prefix
Subnet 1 start address, 2 consecutive private IPs are required
Subnet 2 Name
Subnet 2 Prefix
Subnet 2 start address, 2 consecutive private IPs are required
Subnet 3 Name
Subnet 3 Prefix
Subnet 3 start address, 2 consecutive private IPs are required
Subnet 4 Name
Subnet 4 Prefix
Subnet 4 start address, 2 consecutive private IPs are required
Subnet 5 Name
Subnet 5 Prefix
Enable Serial Console
Connect to FortiManager
FortiManager IP or DNS name to connect to on port TCP/541
FortiManager serial number to add the deployed FortiGate into the FortiManager
Primary FortiGate BYOL license content
Secondary FortiGate BYOL license content
Primary FortiGate BYOL FortiFlex license token
Secondary FortiGate BYOL FortiFlex license token
By default, the deployment will use Azure Marketplace images. In specific cases, using BYOL custom FortiGate images can be deployed. This requires a reference
Location for all resources.

variables.fmgCustomData:
[if(equals(parameters('fortiManager'),'yes'),concat('
config system central-management
set type fortimanager
 set fmg ',parameters('fortiManagerIP'),'
set serial-number ', parameters('fortiManagerSerial'), '
end
 config system interface
 edit port1
 append allowaccess fgfm
 end
 config system interface
 edit port2
 append allowaccess fgfm
 end
'),'')]
variables.customDataHeader:
Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary="12345"
MIME-Version: 1.0

--12345
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="us-ascii"
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
Content-Disposition: attachment; filename="config"
variables.fgaCustomDataBody:
[concat('config system sdn-connector
edit AzureSDN
set type azure
set ha-status enable
set resource-group ', resourceGroup().name, '
set subscription-id ', subscription().subscriptionId, '
config nic
edit ', variables('fgaNic1Name'), '
config ip
edit ipconfig1
set public-ip ', variables('publicIP1Name'), '
next
end
next
end
config route-table
edit ', variables('routeTableName'), '
config route
edit toDefault
set next-hop ', variables('sn2IPfga'), '
next
end
next
end
end
config router static
 edit 1
 set gateway ', variables('sn1GatewayIP'), '
 set device port1
 next
 edit 2
 set dst ', parameters('vnetAddressPrefix'), '
 set gateway ', variables('sn2GatewayIP'), '
 set device port2
 next
 edit 3
set dst 168.63.129.16 255.255.255.255
set device port2
 set gateway ', variables ('sn2GatewayIP'), '
 next
edit 4
set dst 168.63.129.16 255.255.255.255
set device port1
 set gateway ', variables ('sn1GatewayIP'), '
 next
 end
 config system interface
 edit port1
 set mode static
 set ip ', variables('sn1IPfga'), '/', variables('sn1CIDRmask'), '
 set description external
 next
 edit port2
 set mode static
 set ip ', variables('sn2IPfga'), '/', variables('sn2CIDRmask'), '
 set description internal
 next
 edit port3
 set mode static
 set ip ', variables('sn3IPfga'), '/', variables('sn3CIDRmask'), '
 set description hasyncport
 next
 edit port4
 set mode static
 set ip ', variables('sn4IPfga'), '/', variables('sn4CIDRmask'), '
 set description hammgmtport
 set allowaccess ping https ssh ftm
 next
 end
 config system ha
 set group-name AzureHA
 set mode a-p
 set hbdev port3 100
 set session-pickup enable
 set session-pickup-connectionless enable
 set ha-mgmt-status enable
 config ha-mgmt-interfaces
 edit 1
 set interface port4
 set gateway ', variables('sn4GatewayIP'),'
 next
 end
 set override disable
 set priority 255
 set unicast-hb enable
 set unicast-hb-peerip ', variables('sn3IPfgb'), '
 end
', variables('fmgCustomData'), parameters('fortiGateAdditionalCustomData'), '
')]
variables.fgbCustomDataBody:
[concat('config system sdn-connector
edit AzureSDN
set type azure
set ha-status enable
set resource-group ', resourceGroup().name, '
set subscription-id ', subscription().subscriptionId, '
config nic
edit ', variables('fgbNic1Name'), '
config ip
edit ipconfig1
set public-ip ', variables('publicIP1Name'), '
next
end
next
end
config route-table
edit ', variables('routeTableName'), '
config route
edit toDefault
set next-hop ', variables('sn2IPfgb'), '
next
end
next
end
end
config router static
 edit 1
 set gateway ', variables('sn1GatewayIP'), '
 set device port1
 next
 edit 2
 set dst ', parameters('vnetAddressPrefix'), '
 set gateway ', variables('sn2GatewayIP'), '
 set device port2
 next
 edit 3
set dst 168.63.129.16 255.255.255.255
set device port2
 set gateway ', variables ('sn2GatewayIP'), '
 next
edit 4
set dst 168.63.129.16 255.255.255.255
set device port1
 set gateway ', variables ('sn1GatewayIP'), '
 next
 end
 config system interface
 edit port1
 set mode static
 set ip ', variables('sn1IPfgb'), '/', variables('sn1CIDRmask'), '
 set description external
 next
 edit port2
 set mode static
 set ip ', variables('sn2IPfgb'), '/', variables('sn2CIDRmask'), '
 set description internal
 next
 edit port3
 set mode static
 set ip ', variables('sn3IPfgb'), '/', variables('sn3CIDRmask'), '
 set description hasyncport
 next
 edit port4
 set mode static
 set ip ', variables('sn4IPfgb'), '/', variables('sn4CIDRmask'), '
 set description hammgmtport
 set allowaccess ping https ssh ftm
 next
 end
 config system ha
 set group-name AzureHA
 set mode a-p
 set hbdev port3 100
 set session-pickup enable
 set session-pickup-connectionless enable
 set ha-mgmt-status enable
 config ha-mgmt-interfaces
 edit 1
 set interface port4
 set gateway ', variables('sn4GatewayIP'),'
 next
 end
 set override disable
 set priority 1
 set unicast-hb enable
 set unicast-hb-peerip ', variables('sn3IPfga'), '
 end
', variables('fmgCustomData'), parameters('fortiGateAdditionalCustomData'), '
')]
variables.customDataLicenseHeader:
--12345
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="us-ascii"
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
Content-Disposition: attachment; filename="fgtlicense"
